name: Slurpy
description:
Back of Box - ColecoVision (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

For a thousand years, the cave phantom has plotted revenge! By magic it created Vipor Birds, Fanged Snakes, Widowmakers, and Creepers. Then it gave life to the Deathball and Evil Eye. Now, this demon army prepares to rise and cover the outer world. But not if Slurpy can help it! Use your joystick to send Slurpy, the voracious, vacuumous from middle earth into a battle to suck up these slimy mutants.

releases.country: United States, Australia, Canada, New Zealand
